Package utility

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
utility.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends Object
Operates on all project files.

      Returns:

    • findFile

      public static File findFile(File dir, String name)
      Recursively iterates over the entire contents of the given directory.
      Parameters:
      dir - Directory with script files.
      name - Name of the script file.
      Returns:
      Returns null, if file is not found, otherwise returns script file.
